text.textblock: The Plumas National Forest is no longer involved in the paration of an Environmental Impact Statement for the SerCan Timber Sale.
The notice of Intent, published in the
on March 23, 1989, is hereby rescinded (54 FR 11981).

doctitle.textblock: SerCan Timber Sale, Plumas National Forest; Environmental Impact Statement Cancellation

further.textblock: R.C. Bennett, Environmental Coordinator, Plumas National Forest, Box 11500, Quincy, CA 95971, telephone (916) 283-2050.
